text: Emil Theodor Kocher (August 25, 1841 - July 27, 1917) was a Swiss doctor. He won the 1909 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, for his work on the thyroid gland". == References == Category:1841 births Category:1917 deaths Category:Swiss physicians Category:Swiss Nobel Prize winners Category:People from Bern
title: Emil Theodor Kocher
